EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of CAST.ST M&A conference call or presentation 18-Dec-20 3:15pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Castellum AB to Discuss An Increased Share Exchange and Cash Offer to Entra ASA Shareholders Presentation
Göteborg Dec 18, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Castellum AB M&A conference call or presentation Friday, December 18, 2020 at 3:15:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Castellum AB to Discuss An Increased Share Exchange and Cash Offer to Entra ASA Shareholders Presentation
